name: cp2k_general
description: meta info used by the CP2K parser, all names are expected to start with x_cp2k_

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_atom_forces
metaInfos.description: Forces acting on the atoms in this Quickstep calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_atomic_kinds
metaInfos.description: The number of atomic kinds in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_atoms
metaInfos.description: The number of atoms in the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_filename
metaInfos.description: The name of the basis set file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_norm_type
metaInfos.description: Norm type.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_number_of_cartesian_basis_functions
metaInfos.description: Number of Cartesian basis functions.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_number_of_orbital_shell_sets
metaInfos.description: Number of orbital shell sets.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_number_of_orbital_shells
metaInfos.description: Number of orbital shells.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_number_of_primitive_cartesian_functions
metaInfos.description: Number of primitive Cartesian functions.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_basis_set_number_of_spherical_basis_functions
metaInfos.description: Number of spherical basis functions.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_cartesian_basis_functions
metaInfos.description: The number of Cartesian basis functions.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_coordinate_filename
metaInfos.description: The name of the coordinate file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_communication_thread_load
metaInfos.description: Load of the communication thread.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_multiplication_driver
metaInfos.description: DBCSR Multiplication driver

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_multiplication_size_stacks
metaInfos.description: DBCSR Multiplication size of stacks.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_multiplication_stack_size
metaInfos.description: DBCSR Multiplication stack size.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_multrec_recursion_limit
metaInfos.description: DBCSR Multrec recursion limit

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_use_communication_thread
metaInfos.description: Boolean indicating if communication thread is used.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_use_mpi_combined_types
metaInfos.description: Boolean indicating if MPI combined types are used.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_use_mpi_memory_allocation
metaInfos.description: Boolean indicating if MPI memory allocation is used.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_dbcsr_use_subcommunicators
metaInfos.description: Boolean indicating if subcommunicators are used.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_electronic_kinetic_energy
metaInfos.description: Self-consistent electronic kinetic energy calculated with Quickstep

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_end_host
metaInfos.description: The name of the host machine this calculation ended on.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_end_id
metaInfos.description: The process id at the end of this run.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_end_path
metaInfos.description: The path where this calculation ended.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_end_time
metaInfos.description: The ending time for this run.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_end_user
metaInfos.description: The name of the user at the end of the calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_change_scf_iteration
metaInfos.description: At each self-consistent field (SCF) iteration, change of total energy with respect to the previous SCF iteration.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_total
metaInfos.description: Value of the total energy (nuclei + electrons) calculated with Quickstep.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_total_scf_iteration
metaInfos.description: Total electronic energy calculated with xc_method during the self-consistent field (SCF) iterations.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_energy_xc_scf_iteration
metaInfos.description: Exchange-correlation (XC) energy during the self-consistent field (SCF) iteration.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_geminal_filename
metaInfos.description: The name of the geminal file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_input_filename
metaInfos.description: The name of the CP2K input file that produced this calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_kind_basis_set_name
metaInfos.description: The name of the orbital basis set used for this kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_kind_label
metaInfos.description: The label for this atomic kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_kind_number
metaInfos.description: The atomic kind number. For each element there may be multiple kinds specified. This number differentiates them. Not the atomic number.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_kind_number_of_atoms
metaInfos.description: The number of atoms with this kind.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_local_part_of_gth_pseudopotential
metaInfos.description: Maximum angular momentum of the local part of the GTH pseudopotential.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_barostat_temperature_average
metaInfos.description: Average barostat temperature in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_barostat_temperature_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous barostat temperature in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_barostat_time_constant
metaInfos.description: Barostat time constant.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_angle_a_average
metaInfos.description: Average cell vector a angle in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_angle_a_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous cell vector a angle in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_angle_b_average
metaInfos.description: Average cell vector b angle in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_angle_b_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous cell vector b angle in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_angle_c_average
metaInfos.description: Average cell vector c angle in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_angle_c_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous cell vector c angle in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_length_a_average
metaInfos.description: Average cell vector a length in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_length_a_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous cell vector a length in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_length_b_average
metaInfos.description: Average cell vector b length in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_length_b_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous cell vector b length in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_length_c_average
metaInfos.description: Average cell vector c length in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_cell_length_c_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous cell vector c length in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_conserved_quantity
metaInfos.description: Conserved quantity for this MD step.

metaInfos.description: Name of the coordinate file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_coordinates_print_frequency
metaInfos.description: Print frequency for the coordinate file.

metaInfos.description: Average CPU time for this step.

metaInfos.description: Instantaneous CPU time for this step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_dump_filename
metaInfos.description: Name of the dump file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_dump_print_frequency
metaInfos.description: Print frequency for the dump file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_energies_filename
metaInfos.description: Name of the energies file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_energies_print_frequency
metaInfos.description: Print frequency for the energies file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_energy_drift_average
metaInfos.description: Average kinetic energy in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_energy_drift_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous energy drift in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_ensemble_type
metaInfos.description: The ensemble type in molecular dynamics.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_kinetic_energy_average
metaInfos.description: Average kinetic energy in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_kinetic_energy_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous kinetic energy in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_number_of_time_steps
metaInfos.description: Number of requested time steps in molecular dynamics.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_potential_energy_average
metaInfos.description: Average potential energy for an MD step. Averaged over this and the previous steps.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_potential_energy_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous potential energy in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_pressure_average
metaInfos.description: Average pressure in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_pressure_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous pressure in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_print_frequency
metaInfos.description: The print frequency of molecular dynamics information in the CP2K output file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_simulation_cell_filename
metaInfos.description: Simulation cell filename.

metaInfos.description: Simulation cell print frequency.

metaInfos.description: Step number.

metaInfos.description: Target pressure for the barostat.

metaInfos.description: Thermostat target temperature.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_target_temperature_tolerance
metaInfos.description: Target temperature tolerance.

metaInfos.description: Average temperature in an MD step.

metaInfos.description: Instantaneous temperature in an MD step.

metaInfos.description: Simulation time for this step.

metaInfos.description: Time step.

metaInfos.description: Name of the velocities file.

metaInfos.description: Print frequency for the velocities file.

metaInfos.description: Average cell volume in an MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_md_volume_instantaneous
metaInfos.description: Instantaneous cell volume in this MD step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_method_name
metaInfos.description: The method name for this run.

metaInfos.description: The name of the MM potential file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_non_local_part_of_gth_pseudopotential
metaInfos.description: Maximum angular momentum of the non-local part of the GTH pseudopotential.

metaInfos.description: Energy for this optimization step.

metaInfos.description: Energy change for this optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_energy_decrease
metaInfos.description: Whether there has been energy decrease. YES or NO.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_gradient_convergence_limit
metaInfos.description: Convergence criterium for the maximum force component of the current configuration.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_max_gradient
metaInfos.description: Max gradient for this optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_max_gradient_convergence
metaInfos.description: Whether there is convergence in max gradient. YES or NO.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_max_step_size
metaInfos.description: Maximum step size for this optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_method
metaInfos.description: Optimization method for this step

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_gradient
metaInfos.description: RMS gradient for this optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_gradient_convergence
metaInfos.description: Whether there is convergence in rms gradient. YES or NO.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_step_size
metaInfos.description: RMS step size for this optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_rms_step_size_convergence
metaInfos.description: Whether there is convergence in rms step size. YES or NO.

metaInfos.description: Whether there is convergence in step size. YES or NO.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_step_size_convergence_limit
metaInfos.description: Convergence criterium for the maximum geometry change between the current and the last optimizer iteration.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_optimization_used_time
metaInfos.description: Time used for this optimization step.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_orbital_basis_functions
metaInfos.description: Maximum angular momentum of orbital basis functions.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_planewave_cutoff
metaInfos.description: The plane-wave cutoff for the auxiliary basis.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_potential_filename
metaInfos.description: The name of the potential file.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_preferred_diagonalization_library
metaInfos.description: The name of the preferred diagonalization library.

metaInfos.name: x_cp2k_preferred_fft_library
metaInfos.description: The name of the preferred FFT library.

metaInfos.description: The number of primitive Cartesian functions.

metaInfos.description: The time when this program was compiled.

metaInfos.description: Boolean indicating whether the quickstep SCF cycle converged or not.
